channel.title: Hugh Plat on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hugh Plat on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Building Blocks, Literally
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: We talk a lot about technology in this newsletter, but the fact of the matter is that if you zoom out a little bit and think about it, we’re really telling the story about how we got to the modern day—how the boring, mundane, or unusual elements of our lives got us to this point. The building blocks, so to say. This time, we’re not going metaphorical with our block talk, like we did in the last issue.
